description:
Automatically rename and organize your TV shows and Movies. Also moves them to your Media Library!
TV Series Episodes and Movie File Renamer works with IMDb.com, TV.com, theTVDB.com, EPGUIDES.com and MMA (Mixed Martial Arts) from WikiPedia.

theRenamer renames your TV or Movie files into a neat and orderly format.....and adds in the TV show episodes titles!
 
From this: [vd-mux-ita]The.Unit.1x01.Piromane.ITA.DVDMux.[colombo-bt.org].avi
To this: The Unit.1x01.First Responders.avi
......... in just 1 simple Drag and Drop motion.
summary: Automatically rename and organize your TV shows and Movies. Also moves them to your Media Library!
author: Alfred Toh
